ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class ViewStoriesActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.ViewStoriesActivity

  • public class ViewStoriesActivity
extends Activity
    The main activity of the application. Displays a list of stories to read.

    In this activity a reader can:
    1. Click a story to begin reading at the first page
    2. Long click a story to cache it to local storage
    3. Search for stories
    In this activity an author can:
    1. Add a new story
    2. Long click a story to edit the story
    The ViewStoriesActivity is a view of the application.
